item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>i dream of sitting in a training session for a new project management system! (or maybe not... it's the heat, i'm getting delirious)</p>
item.content:encoded: i dream of sitting in a training session for a new project management system! (or maybe not… it’s the heat, i’m getting delirious)

item.title: By: fiona
item.dc:creator: fiona
item.description: <p>matthew, would be much worse if you were sitting in a training session for a project management system like I am!</p>
item.content:encoded: matthew, would be much worse if you were sitting in a training session for a project management system like I am!
